ModMetaData.name: Drape for Hiding
ModMetaData.author: Si-Cafe
ModMetaData.description:
Prevents the drape from passing through and hides the pawn when it is behind. (Note; To enable "Drape", you need "Royalty DLC". To enable "Divider" and "Plank divider", you need "VFE Props and Decor MOD".
If neither of these are present, this mod's functionality will not be enabled.)
